item.title: Looking For Voice Actor For YouTube Channel About The Simpsons - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a voice actor to work with me on a new YouTube channel about The Simpsons theories and topics.

Here is an example of the content I will be making: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UXFtoFMDif0&t=1s
Here is an excerpt of the transcript: https://docs.google.com/document/d/10zYsemsxOEIJ6cv2yagds5xvsuiJu7wxHWTXoQ1liGc/edit?usp=sharing

I am looking for a youthful voice actor who can do a casual but slightly upbeat tone, with the occasional joke and quip. In the example video you can see that the narrator is very casual, but entertaining and talks to the audience. Ideally, I'm looking for someone who is a big Simpsons fan who has good familiarity with the show.

Videos will be 8-10 minutes in duration, and I aim to work up to 3 per week long-term. 1 per week currently.

My budget is $2 per minute of narration recorded due to the variety in my video lengths. Therefore, please apply with your desired rate per minute.

In your application it is essential you provide an example of past work so I can hear your voice. It does not need to match this job description exactly, any past work that gives me an idea of your voice will work.

Thank you!

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 21, 2024 11:06 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:US English Dialect, Voice Acting, Voice-Over, Young Adult
Skills: US English Dialect, Voice Acting, Voice-Over, Young Adult
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Music Video Launch Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced individual to help us launch a music video titled 'Song for Ukraine' primarily on YouTube, but also on other social media platforms. The project is not for profit and aims to raise awareness for Ukraine. As a Music Video Launch Specialist, your responsibilities will include creating and implementing an effective marketing strategy, optimizing video metadata, engaging with online communities, and leveraging influencers for maximum reach. If you have a deep understanding of YouTube's algorithm, strong knowledge of social media platforms, and excellent communication skills, we want to hear from you!

Relevant skills:
- YouTube channel management
- Social media marketing
- Video optimization
- Community engagement
- Influencer marketing

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 11:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Music Video, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Music Video, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a skilled video editor for YouTube - Upwork
item.description:
So, This is my channel
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkQjP85QVYQQAxkbqpJsYsg
I need a very skilled video editor to level up my content in order to compete with bigger channels in my niche.

example:
https://youtu.be/JQFQ4BHL8_g?si=Kiz6TTFb0mr-y9iT

We're looking for someone with the following requirements
- Must be fluent in English
- Fast turnaround time (3-5days)
- Fast response times
- Good understanding of YouTube retention (important)
- Ideally has expertise in storytelling (important)
- Add clips to give more context to the video
- Capacity for long-term work
- $50 - $100 PER video (depends on quality)

When applying, please provide us examples of previous work and YouTube videos you’ve worked or you will automatically be disqualified to work with us.

Start the proposal with (I READ IT ALL) so I know you've read everything.


Budget: $60
Posted On: June 21, 2024 11:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Country: Morocco

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Hollywood/Celebrity Niche - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced video editor with a passion for the Hollywood/celebrity niche. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and producing high-quality videos that showcase the glamour and excitement of the entertainment industry. Your main tasks will include selecting and editing footage, adding special effects and transitions, and ensuring the final product meets our clients' specifications. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and be able to work independently to meet tight deadlines. Experience with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro is required.

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Storytelling
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Knowledge of video editing software

Description
Video Duration 15-20 minutes
Pay-$15

Join our team and showcase your editing skills in the Hollywood/celebrity niche!

Budget: $15
Posted On: June 21, 2024 11:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: India
click to apply

item.title: Video Course Copy and Download - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for someone to copy and download an online video course with approximately 24 hours of content. The task involves ensuring that all video files are properly downloaded and organized for easy access. The ideal candidate should have experience in video downloading and the ability to work independently. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure that all videos are accurately copied. This gig requires strong organizational and time management skills. If you are a reliable and detail-oriented individual with the expertise to handle this task efficiently, we would love to hear from you.

- Video downloading
- Organization
- Time management

item.title: fast-paced, creative and skilled VIDEO/REELS Creator with Graphic Design Skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Video/Reels Creator with a strong background in Graphic Design (After Effects or capcut or Premiere) and Fast-paced Editing Style to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a passion for creating fast-paced, captivating and CREATIVE videos and reels that engage and captivate the audience, with different animated Fonts (similar to examples) , play with creative but super-fitting styles, Effects, Transitions, creative Ideas, Time-paste of words & speech, and visuals / humor in the Choice of Collages/ visuals -Here few examples:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6H1zCEoteQ/
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C7DX_q5IKQz/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C58gn5MuL3o/
https://www.instagram.com/p/C5gOYa6OQhQ/

This Project/role is for a New very interesting Project - a new Talkshow interviewing some of the most impactful Artists and Entrepreneurs around the World, And definitely looking for someone that loves Cinema, Film and Creating/ Editing with Storytelling and impact.

Skills:
- Video editing
- Graphic design
- Creativity!
- Attention to detail, placements,
- Social media savvy

Please send me similar work of fast-paced Trailers, Reels, videos you have done in the past. Thank you and looking forward to hear from you!



Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 10:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Youtube editor - Upwork
item.description:
*LOOKING FOR A RELIABLE EDITOR*

Hi, I am looking for an editor who is reliable, good with communication and time management.
I plan to uploads video each week therefore I need someone who is committed and can work independently.

The budget isn’t the highest right now however, if you are consistent and deliver great, creative videos this will increase. Your work load will also increase. As my channel is so new, I want someone to work with me in the growth of the channel and naturally you will be paid more over time.

First, I need help with creating good videos and grow my you tube channel.

I have had many editors approach me who are very quick to say they can do the work but show no attention to detail or understanding of the style I am looking for.

It’s important you look at my videos and my channel so you understand the content and style.
Note if you do not look at my content and you do not grasp what I am looking for, you will not be considered for the job and I will not reply to you.

https://youtu.be/diTTuj6Z1oE?si=RUKL0DqY5cknp8fY

https://youtu.be/QpL1zamYHSE?si=SUQFNPUqJVznSL1E

https://youtu.be/tvadclYK_0U?si=ecPqOM1S_zhx9YqA

https://youtu.be/UMzs6-gGl00?si=ga4mQ_ZXEIFYfSnI

https://youtu.be/ij6dEOYtmnc?si=aaBsY0g4q-Hb1FqA

https://youtu.be/gIOtaGqXm_4?si=AiJAUNLHfI5-lnJ3

Please see other videos on the channel so you can understand my content

Please reply via Upwork if you are interested!

Thank you

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 21, 2024 10:40 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Editing, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, TikTok, Instagram, Subtitle Edit, Video Ad Campaign, Video Editing Software, Video Animation
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Commercial, Video Editing, YouTube Video, Video Editing & Production, TikTok, Instagram, Subtitle Edit, Video Ad Campaign, Video Editing Software, Video Animation
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Tutorial and Explanation Video Creator (English) - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for top video creators meeting the following criteria for How-To/Tutorial YouTube Videos :)

    - Example of channel: http://www.youtube.com/@EasyAsThat
    - Voice over + Short edit
    - $2 for each video ($3 for uploading on YouTube and editing thumbnail basic template)
    -  Video duration: should be around 1 and 4 minute (depending on topic)
    -  25 videos per week
    - Creative thinking and problem-solving skills
    - Sample of minimum video creation level
    - Clear understandable English
    - A good quality Mic
  

Do you agree with the pricing from the description? (Please do not apply if not)
Do you have over 70% Job Success? (Please do not apply if not)
Do you have earned more than $50,00? (Please do not apply if not)

Thanks a lot in advance!

Budget: $200

Category: Video Production
Skills:Explainer Video, Video Editing, Voice-Over, Video Production

item.title: Personal Brand Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We're on the hunt for a talented multifaceted creative to support with our CEOs personal brand and other tasks related to marketing our agency.

The ideal applicant will have extensive experience with graphic design, video editing and copywriting. They will understand the varied content requirements for key social channels like LinkedIn, Instagram and Twitter.

Responsibilities include:
- LinkedIn banner design
- LinkedIn post design
- Video editing short form content
- Competitor & trend research

This is a broad scope role, with the key focus on supporting our CEO develop a robust content workflow across multiple social channels.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 10:18 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Management, Content Writing, Branding
Skills: Graphic Design, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing & Production, Social Media Management, Content Writing, Branding
